text: John Albert Knebel (born October 4, 1936) is an American government official. He served as Secretary of Agriculture under President Gerald Ford serving from November 4, 1976 through January 20, 1977. His period in this office was brief and ended January 20, 1977, when Jimmy Carter replaced Ford in the White House. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profiles of former Secretaries of Agriculture *American President site Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Agriculture Category:Politicians from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Tulsa, Oklahoma
title: John Albert Knebel
